treatment-md.title: Priasthenopus gilliesi Molineri, Salles & Peters, 2015, comb. n.
treatment-md.article-title: Phylogeny and biogeography of Asthenopodinae with a revision of Asthenopus, reinstatement of Asthenopodes, and the description of the new genera Hubbardipes and Priasthenopus (Ephemeroptera, Polymitarcyidae)
